name: J.K. Rowling
bio: British author, best known for the Harry Potter series.

name: George R.R. Martin
bio: American novelist and short story writer in the fantasy, horror, and science fiction genres.

name: Agatha Christie
bio: English writer known for her sixty-six detective novels and fourteen short story collections.

name: Naguib Mahfouz
bio: Egyptian writer who won the Nobel Prize for Literature in 1988.
